participant_1.background:
I've been at sea for too long and miss my pets.
i am studying to be a special education teacher.
i am from georgia.
I am a person who loves the cold weather and enjoys living in rural Wisconsin.
i like to make clothes.

participant_2.background:
I remember playing with my cat in the backyard all day long.
i enjoy home cooked meals.
i live with my parents and my little brother.
I was born in the big city, but I now live in the country with my dog.
I love my family, even though they are a little bit crazy.

content.text: Hey, I'm from Georgia and I just moved to Wisconsin.
Oh nice! I was born in the big city but now I live in the country.
How do you like the country?
I love it! I have a lot more space and I can spend more time outside.
That sounds nice! I miss my pets back in Georgia. I have a cat and a dog.
I love animals! I have a dog and I used to have a cat.
What kind of dog do you have?
He's a golden retriever. He's the sweetest dog ever.
Aww, I love golden retrievers! They're so friendly.
So what do you like to do for fun in the country?
I like to go for walks in the woods, go fishing, and just relax.
That sounds really nice. I miss being able to relax.
You should come visit me sometime! We can go fishing or hiking or just hang out.
That would be great! I'd love to see you again.
Great! I'll send you my address
